title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5204.4 - Criteria for approval of plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5204.4 - Criteria for approval of plans

State Regulations
(a) To be eligible for expedited deployment
funding, a PSAP must: (1)
be operated by a
local governmental entity other than the State Police; and
(2)
be designated by resolution of a county
governing board pursuant to County Law, section 3301(1)(b) to receive all
wireless 911 calls within the county. (b) Priority in approving plans will be given
to those PSAPs which had not attained enhanced wireless 911 capability as of

May 15, 2003. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5204.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
